cookingTips: Soak corn in water before grilling to keep kernels from drying out; leave husks on for protection
Grill over medium-high heat, turning frequently, until kernels develop light char and become tender
Brush with softened butter mixed with salt and pepper immediately after grilling for best flavor absorption
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through selecting fresh corn, managing grill temperature, and achieving perfect tender kernels with charred spots.
